channel.title: 317 [PI] my new years event

item.title: 317 [PI] my new years event
item.dc:creator: @aekramer aekramer
item.description:
@aekramer wrote:

[quote=“jwags, post:1, topic:426845”]well it is in the party room

ok so i might have forgotten to add a file, if u get an error tell me and i will find it
but i think i have them all in
ok here we go
file - NPCHandler.java
search

you should see

[CODE] if (npcs[i].isDead == true)

{
if (npcs

[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].applyDead == false && npcs

[i].needRespawn == false) {
npcs

[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs

[i].facePlayer(0);
npcs

[i].killedBy = getNpcKillerId(i);
npcs

[i].animNumber = getDeadEmote(i); // dead emote[/CODE]

ABOVE that add

//new year if (npcs[i].npcType == 2590){ npcs[i].animNumber = 2339; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 212){ npcs[i].animNumber = 866; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2581){ npcs[i].animNumber = 866; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2796){ npcs[i].animNumber = 2339; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 280){ npcs[i].animNumber = 352; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 605){ npcs[i].animNumber = 605; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } //end new year

save but dont close
now lets actually spawn the npc’s

goto spawn-config.cfg

enter this at the top

[CODE]//new years
spawn = 2590 2742 3476 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 605 2746 3460 0 4 0 0 0 1
spawn = 280 2734 3474 0 4 0 0 0 1
spawn = 3109 2736 3477 0 2 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2796 2745 3465 0 5 0 0 0 1
spawn = 1863 2740 3469 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 659 2742 3469 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2581 2740 3468 0 4 0 0 0 1
spawn = 212 2735 3468 0 5 0 0 0 1
spawn = 1357 2730 3468 0 5 0 0 0 1
spawn = 1864 2730 3471 0 2 0 0 0 1
spawn = 956 2733 3474 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 956 2738 3463 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2187 2732 3476 0 2 0 0 0 1
spawn = 3222 2739 3472 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 3222 2734 3470 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 340 2736 3472 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2429 2739 3473 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2203 2739 3472 0 2 0 0 0 1

//end new years
[/CODE]
now this is all the npc’s. you might notice something weird about the walk. well it change which way they face. but you dont have that added yet, so lets add it.
save and close

go back to NPCHandler.java
search for if(npcs[i].walkingType == 1)

above that add

[CODE] if (npcs[i].walkingType > 1) {
switch(npcs[i].walkingType) {

					case 5:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
						break;

					case 4:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY);
						break;

					case 3:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
						break;
					case 2:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1);
						break;
					}
				}[/CODE]

this is the only part i had to look up.
save and now you can close

now you want to go to ObjectManager.java
and add

[CODE]//new years
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4286, 2738, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4286, 2737, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4641, 2741, 3472, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6246, 2742, 3471, 0, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2728, 3478, 2, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(362, 2729, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(362, 2729, 3469, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(364, 2729, 3470, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(885, 2731, 3469, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3470, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3467, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3466, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3471, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2730, 3472, 3, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2730, 3473, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3471, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3470, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3469, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3468, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3467, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2742, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2739, 3463, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2739, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2737, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2735, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2735, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2735, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2738, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2741, 3463, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(117, 2736, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(117, 2739, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(117, 2742, 3463, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2740, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2737, 3466, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2742, 3466, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2737, 3463, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2738, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2736, 3466, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2741, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2740, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(120, 2735, 3463, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(120, 2742, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(120, 2741, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(121, 2738, 3463, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(121, 2741, 3465, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(122, 2738, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2728, 3460, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2746, 3460, 1, 10);
//end new years[/CODE]
add that under

now this next part sets the balloons to popable and gives rewords randomly out of every 8 pops
goto -> ActionHandler.java

find

go down a little not too much, past all that int stuff though

add

[CODE]//new year
//npc talking

//refer to next new year note in this file

//end npc talking
//balloons
case 6246:

	c.getItems().addItem(1917, 1);
		

	break;

case 115:

	c.startAnimation(10017);
	new Object(115, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 115, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}

	break;

case 116:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(116, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 116, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 117:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(117, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 117, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 118:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(118, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 118, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 119:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(119, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 119, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 120:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(120, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 120, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 121:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(121, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 121, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 122:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(122, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 122, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;

//end balloons

//end new year[/CODE]

ok ill go over one case

case is the id of course (object id)
then u got

this really says, player must stomp on balloon in order to pop

[CODE]new Object(122, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 122, 10);[/CODE]
this pretty much says get rid of the balloon and re add it (so it can fall again)

this pm’s the player saying you popped the balloon!

[B]if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){ c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000); }[/B]
finally this part says randomly out of every 8 tried give the person 2k gold =D

now search

go down a little and add

[code]//new year
//drunk guard
case 3109:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(90,

npcType);

	break;

//dude in chair
case 2203:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(92,

npcType);

	break;

//closed eye contest
case 1863:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(97,

npcType);

	break;

//dancing monk
case 280:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(98,

npcType);
break;
//dude facing wall
//part 1
case 2187:
if (c.NYProgress == 0){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(105,

npcType);
}
//part 5
else if (c.NYProgress == 5){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(130,

npcType);
c.getItems().deleteItem(2019, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(386, 600);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 100000);
c.getItems().addItem(611, 1);
}
//end part 5
else{
c.getDH().sendDialogues(112,

npcType);
}
break;
//part 2
case 2796:
if (c.NYProgress == 1){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(116,

npcType);
}
else if (c.NYProgress == 2){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(127,

npcType);
}
//part 4
else if (c.NYProgress == 4){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(129,

npcType);
c.getItems().deleteItem(1913, 7);
c.getItems().addItem(2019, 1);
}
//end part 4
else{
c.getDH().sendDialogues(114,

npcType);
}
break;

//part 3
case 1357:
if (c.NYProgress == 2){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(122,

npcType);
}
else if (c.NYProgress == 3 && c.getItems

().hasAllNYPprogress()){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(128,

npcType);
}
/*else if (c.NYProgress == 3){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(127,

npcType);
}*/
else if (c.getItems ().hasAllNYPprogress()){
c.getItems().deleteItem(1512, 4);
c.getItems().deleteItem(1917, 7);
c.getItems().addItem(1913, 1);
}
else {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(126, npcType);
}

	break;

//end new year[/code]

that was really just calling dialogue ideas from DialogueHandler.java

now search

and scroll down a little and add

[code]//new year
//rlly because the 2nd click on skippy was ocding me
case 2796:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(113,

npcType);
break;

//end new year[/code]

one npc had 5 options, so this kind of makes it say sumtin when u click that other option.

save and close

now go to DialogueHandler.java
search

go down a little and add whats at this link (soz ran out of room)
http://pastebin.com/2uXKYLc4

thats just saying, when actionhandler calls this idea say this thing, if nextchat does not = 0 move to the case it does =, if it does = 0 then end chat session.

ok this part can get a bit confusing… if you do not add it the quest wont progress at all

open -> playersave.java

find

now a little below that you see

click right in front of that bracket } and paste this
(EXACTLY AS I HAVE IT)

[code]
} else if

(token.equals(“NY-Progress”)) {

p.NYProgress = Integer.parseInt(token2);
[/code]

now find

below that you see

right after that ; paste this (exactly and on the same line)

[code]
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("NY-Progress = ", 0, 14);
characterfile.write

(Integer.toString(p.NYProgress), 0, Integer.toString

(p.NYProgress).length());[/code]

save and close

this stuffs just adds new values in the character files
but they dont have an integer (place holder) yet, so the comp. wont know what to store its value to. so open up client.java and search

right above that add

//new year public int NYProgress; //end new year
save and close

that set our place holder

now go to -> ItemAssistant.java and search

you should see

[code]public void dropArrowNpc() {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] ==

  1.  return;
    int enemyX = Server.npcHandler.npcs

[c.oldNpcIndex].getX();
int enemyY = Server.npcHandler.npcs

[c.oldNpcIndex].getY();
if(Misc.random(10) >= 4) {
if (Server.itemHandler.itemAmount

(c.rangeItemUsed, enemyX, enemyY) == 0) {

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.rangeItemUsed,

enemyX, enemyY, 1, c.getId());
} else if

(Server.itemHandler.itemAmount(c.rangeItemUsed, enemyX,

enemyY) != 0) {
int amount =

Server.itemHandler.itemAmount(c.rangeItemUsed, enemyX,

enemyY);

Server.itemHandler.removeGroundItem(c, c.rangeItemUsed,

enemyX, enemyY, false);

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.rangeItemUsed,

enemyX, enemyY, amount+1, c.getId());
}
}
} [/code]

right under that add

[code]//new year
public boolean hasAllNYPprogress() {
return playerHasItem(1512,4) &&

playerHasItem(1917,7);
}

//end new year[/code]

save and close

open -> ClickItem

scroll down a bit and add

[code]//new year
if(itemId == 2019) {
c.sendMessage("I probably shouldn’t

drink that.");
}
if(itemId == 611) {
c.sendMessage(“You spawn a beer.”);
c.getItems().addItem(1917,1);
}
if(itemId == 1917) {
c.startAnimation(1327);
c.getItems().deleteItem(1917, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(1919,1);
c.startAnimation(2770);
}

	if(itemId == 1913) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(1913, 1);

c.getItems().addItem(1919,1);
c.sendMessage(“WOW! Thatz Stwonngz”);
c.startAnimation(3040);
}
//end new year[/code]

this is what happens when certain items are clicked.

ok save close compile run done

owe and the turning npc’s works with any you can do more if you want. idk
here are the rules
//for this, 1 = make the npc walk, 2 = make the npc face north, 3 make the npc face south, 4 make it face east, 5 make it face west.

you might want to open that door in the front, and maybe add a portal

credits 99% me 1% to dude who turned the npc’s “jaeela”

here pics


thanks again[/quote]

item.title: 317 [PI] my new years event
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude461, post:19, topic:426845”][quote author=Team_Rocket link=topic=529543.msg3871881#msg3871881 date=1325391031]

Well I am going to use this in my server (opening tonight xD) but I noticed you fucked up majorly in this.
It was an easy fix but for idiots and leechers they wouldn’t know how to fix.
In Dialoguehandler.java you tell us to add many cases. The cases you have us add are not set up right. You have partial text going like this:
“something
here” and it sets off the entire chat and causes 100 errors, just look into fixing
8/10 overall.

  1. Post the problem in the Server Help section if you can’t figure it out.
  2. You aren’t in a position to look down on others if you’re using this tutorial.
  3. That wouldn’t cause 100 errors, It’s most likely a mistake on your part.
  4. This tutorial is a 1/10 at best.
    [/quote]
    I fixed it myself.
    I was just posting an error HE did.
    Don’t believe me? Follow EXACTLY what his tut says and compile
    It is my opinion on how I rate the tut.[/quote]

I didn’t mean to offend you, I’m just trying to help. I’m not about to follow a tutorial of any type. It’s your opinion, but I’m far more qualified to rate a tutorial. If you’d like to continue this debate, please PM me, we shouldn’t be arguing in this thread.

Read full topic

and btw i did edit it, there is now a point
way quest works
step one - talk to npc facing wall
step two - talk to dude in chair thats near balloons
step three - talk to sam the bartender
step four - get 4 logs and 7 beers
step five - talk to drunk thats in chair again
step six - talk to dude facing wall

reword
-100k gold
-600 shark
-object which spawns you beers.

item.title: 317 [PI] my new years event
item.dc:creator: @Team_Rocket Team_Rocket
item.description:
@Team_Rocket wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:10, topic:426845”][quote author=kickingjamie link=topic=529543.msg3864908#msg3864908 date=1324936271]
Why am I getting raped for giving constructive critism?
[/quote]

Ignore them… They think they’re grammar nazi’s when they’re not.[/quote]

I never said I was a Grammar Nazi, I believe I said I was acting like one once. Trust me when I say you aren’t either, no matter how much you’d like to believe that you are. I don’t know why you’re being so hostile today, but you’re being a real asshole right now. Are you bi-polar or on drugs? Nobody just shifts their attitude like you do.

EDIT: Jamie and I already kissed and made up, so if that’s why you’re doing it, then you can stop.

item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

item.title: 317 [PI] my new years event
item.dc:creator: @jwags jwags
item.description:
@jwags wrote:

well it is in the party room

ok so i might have forgotten to add a file, if u get an error tell me and i will find it
but i think i have them all in
ok here we go
file - NPCHandler.java
search

you should see

[CODE] if (npcs[i].isDead == true)

{
if (npcs

[i].actionTimer == 0 && npcs[i].applyDead == false && npcs

[i].needRespawn == false) {
npcs

[i].updateRequired = true;
npcs

[i].facePlayer(0);
npcs

[i].killedBy = getNpcKillerId(i);
npcs

[i].animNumber = getDeadEmote(i); // dead emote[/CODE]

ABOVE that add

//new year if (npcs[i].npcType == 2590){ npcs[i].animNumber = 2339; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 212){ npcs[i].animNumber = 866; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2581){ npcs[i].animNumber = 866; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 2796){ npcs[i].animNumber = 2339; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 280){ npcs[i].animNumber = 352; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } if (npcs[i].npcType == 605){ npcs[i].animNumber = 605; npcs[i].animUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; } //end new year

save but dont close
now lets actually spawn the npc’s

goto spawn-config.cfg

enter this at the top

[CODE]//new years
spawn = 2590 2742 3476 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 605 2746 3460 0 4 0 0 0 1
spawn = 280 2734 3474 0 4 0 0 0 1
spawn = 3109 2736 3477 0 2 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2796 2745 3465 0 5 0 0 0 1
spawn = 1863 2740 3469 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 659 2742 3469 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2581 2740 3468 0 4 0 0 0 1
spawn = 212 2735 3468 0 5 0 0 0 1
spawn = 1357 2730 3468 0 5 0 0 0 1
spawn = 1864 2730 3471 0 2 0 0 0 1
spawn = 956 2733 3474 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 956 2738 3463 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2187 2732 3476 0 2 0 0 0 1
spawn = 3222 2739 3472 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 3222 2734 3470 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 340 2736 3472 0 1 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2429 2739 3473 0 3 0 0 0 1
spawn = 2203 2739 3472 0 2 0 0 0 1

//end new years
[/CODE]
now this is all the npc’s. you might notice something weird about the walk. well it change which way they face. but you dont have that added yet, so lets add it.
save and close

go back to NPCHandler.java
search for if(npcs[i].walkingType == 1)

above that add

[CODE] if (npcs[i].walkingType > 1) {
switch(npcs[i].walkingType) {

					case 5:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX-1, npcs[i].absY);
						break;

					case 4:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX+1, npcs[i].absY);
						break;

					case 3:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY-1);
						break;
					case 2:
						npcs[i].turnNpc(npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY+1);
						break;
					}
				}[/CODE]

this is the only part i had to look up.
save and now you can close

now you want to go to ObjectManager.java
and add

[CODE]//new years
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4286, 2738, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4286, 2737, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4641, 2741, 3472, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(6246, 2742, 3471, 0, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(2213, 2728, 3478, 2, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(362, 2729, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(362, 2729, 3469, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(364, 2729, 3470, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(885, 2731, 3469, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3470, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3468, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3467, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3466, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2731, 3471, 0, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(886, 2730, 3472, 3, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2730, 3473, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3471, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3470, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3469, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3468, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3467, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(1100, 2732, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2742, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2739, 3463, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2739, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2737, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(115, 2735, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2735, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2735, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2738, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(116, 2741, 3463, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(117, 2736, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(117, 2739, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(117, 2742, 3463, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2740, 3465, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2737, 3466, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2742, 3466, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(118, 2737, 3463, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2738, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2736, 3466, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2741, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(119, 2740, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(120, 2735, 3463, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(120, 2742, 3464, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(120, 2741, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(121, 2738, 3463, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(122, 2738, 3466, 1, 10);

c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2728, 3460, 1, 10);
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(-1, 2746, 3460, 1, 10);
//end new years[/CODE]
add that under

now this next part sets the balloons to popable and gives rewords randomly out of every 8 pops
goto -> ActionHandler.java

find

go down a little not too much, past all that int stuff though

add

[CODE]//new year
//npc talking

//refer to next new year note in this file

//end npc talking
//balloons
case 6246:

	c.getItems().addItem(1917, 1);
		

	break;

case 115:

	c.startAnimation(10017);
	new Object(115, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 115, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}

	break;

case 116:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(116, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 116, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 117:
c.startAnimation(10017);

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 117, 10);

c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 118:
c.startAnimation(10017);

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 118, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 119:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(119, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 119, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 120:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(120, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 120, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;
case 121:
c.startAnimation(10017);

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 121, 10);

}
break;
case 122:
c.startAnimation(10017);
new Object(122, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 122, 10);
c.sendMessage(“You popped a balloon!”);
if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){
c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000);
}
break;

//end balloons

//end new year[/CODE]

ok ill go over one case

case is the id of course (object id)
then u got

this really says, player must stomp on balloon in order to pop

[CODE]new Object(122, c.objectX, c.objectY,

c.heightLevel, 1, 10, 122, 10);[/CODE]
this pretty much says get rid of the balloon and re add it (so it can fall again)

this pm’s the player saying you popped the balloon!

[B]if (Misc.random(8) <= 1){ c.getItems().addItem(995, 2000); }[/B]
finally this part says randomly out of every 8 tried give the person 2k gold =D

now search

go down a little and add

[code]//new year
//drunk guard
case 3109:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(90,

npcType);

	break;

//dude in chair
case 2203:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(92,

npcType);

	break;

//closed eye contest
case 1863:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(97,

npcType);

	break;

//dancing monk
case 280:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(98,

npcType);
break;
//dude facing wall
//part 1
case 2187:
if (c.NYProgress == 0){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(105,

npcType);
}
//part 5
else if (c.NYProgress == 5){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(130,

npcType);
c.getItems().deleteItem(2019, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(386, 600);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 100000);
c.getItems().addItem(611, 1);
}
//end part 5
else{
c.getDH().sendDialogues(112,

npcType);
}
break;
//part 2
case 2796:
if (c.NYProgress == 1){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(116,

npcType);
}
else if (c.NYProgress == 2){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(127,

npcType);
}
//part 4
else if (c.NYProgress == 4){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(129,

npcType);
c.getItems().deleteItem(1913, 7);
c.getItems().addItem(2019, 1);
}
//end part 4
else{
c.getDH().sendDialogues(114,

npcType);
}
break;

//part 3
case 1357:
if (c.NYProgress == 2){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(122,

npcType);
}
else if (c.NYProgress == 3 && c.getItems

().hasAllNYPprogress()){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(128,

npcType);
}
/*else if (c.NYProgress == 3){
c.getDH().sendDialogues(127,

npcType);
}*/
else if (c.getItems ().hasAllNYPprogress()){
c.getItems().deleteItem(1512, 4);
c.getItems().deleteItem(1917, 7);
c.getItems().addItem(1913, 1);
}
else {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(126, npcType);
}

	break;

//end new year[/code]

that was really just calling dialogue ideas from DialogueHandler.java

now search

and scroll down a little and add

[code]//new year
//rlly because the 2nd click on skippy was ocding me
case 2796:
c.getDH().sendDialogues(113,

npcType);
break;

//end new year[/code]

one npc had 5 options, so this kind of makes it say sumtin when u click that other option.

save and close

now go to DialogueHandler.java
search

go down a little and add whats at this link (soz ran out of room)
http://pastebin.com/2uXKYLc4

thats just saying, when actionhandler calls this idea say this thing, if nextchat does not = 0 move to the case it does =, if it does = 0 then end chat session.

ok this part can get a bit confusing… if you do not add it the quest wont progress at all

open -> playersave.java

find

now a little below that you see

click right in front of that bracket } and paste this
(EXACTLY AS I HAVE IT)

[code]
} else if

(token.equals(“NY-Progress”)) {

p.NYProgress = Integer.parseInt(token2);
[/code]

now find

below that you see

right after that ; paste this (exactly and on the same line)

[code]
characterfile.newLine();
characterfile.write("NY-Progress = ", 0, 14);
characterfile.write

(Integer.toString(p.NYProgress), 0, Integer.toString

(p.NYProgress).length());[/code]

save and close

this stuffs just adds new values in the character files
but they dont have an integer (place holder) yet, so the comp. wont know what to store its value to. so open up client.java and search

right above that add

//new year public int NYProgress; //end new year
save and close

that set our place holder

now go to -> ItemAssistant.java and search

you should see

[code]public void dropArrowNpc() {
if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerCape] ==

  1.  return;
    int enemyX = Server.npcHandler.npcs

[c.oldNpcIndex].getX();
int enemyY = Server.npcHandler.npcs

[c.oldNpcIndex].getY();
if(Misc.random(10) >= 4) {
if (Server.itemHandler.itemAmount

(c.rangeItemUsed, enemyX, enemyY) == 0) {

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.rangeItemUsed,

enemyX, enemyY, 1, c.getId());
} else if

(Server.itemHandler.itemAmount(c.rangeItemUsed, enemyX,

enemyY) != 0) {
int amount =

Server.itemHandler.itemAmount(c.rangeItemUsed, enemyX,

enemyY);

Server.itemHandler.removeGroundItem(c, c.rangeItemUsed,

enemyX, enemyY, false);

Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, c.rangeItemUsed,

enemyX, enemyY, amount+1, c.getId());
}
}
} [/code]

right under that add

[code]//new year
public boolean hasAllNYPprogress() {
return playerHasItem(1512,4) &&

playerHasItem(1917,7);
}

//end new year[/code]

save and close

open -> ClickItem

scroll down a bit and add

[code]//new year
if(itemId == 2019) {
c.sendMessage("I probably shouldn’t

drink that.");
}
if(itemId == 611) {
c.sendMessage(“You spawn a beer.”);
c.getItems().addItem(1917,1);
}
if(itemId == 1917) {
c.startAnimation(1327);
c.getItems().deleteItem(1917, 1);
c.getItems().addItem(1919,1);
c.startAnimation(2770);
}

	if(itemId == 1913) {
	c.getItems().deleteItem(1913, 1);

c.getItems().addItem(1919,1);
c.sendMessage(“WOW! Thatz Stwonngz”);
c.startAnimation(3040);
}
//end new year[/code]

this is what happens when certain items are clicked.

ok save close compile run done

owe and the turning npc’s works with any you can do more if you want. idk
here are the rules
//for this, 1 = make the npc walk, 2 = make the npc face north, 3 make the npc face south, 4 make it face east, 5 make it face west.

you might want to open that door in the front, and maybe add a portal

credits 99% me 1% to dude who turned the npc’s “jaeela”

here pics


thanks again
